title: FND User Responsibilities / FND Kullanıcı Sorumlulukları
description: Monitors user access rights and responsibilities assigned in Oracle Applications to ensure proper security and access control

queries.sql: SELECT fu.USER_ID, fu.USER_NAME, fr.RESPONSIBILITY_ID, fr.RESPONSIBILITY_NAME, fru.END_DATE FROM FND_USER fu LEFT JOIN FND_USER_RESP_GROUPS_TEMP furg ON fu.USER_ID = furg.USER_ID LEFT JOIN FND_RESPONSIBILITY fr ON furg.RESPONSIBILITY_GROUP_ID = fr.RESPONSIBILITY_ID LEFT JOIN FND_USER_RESP_GROUPS fru ON fru.USER_ID = fu.USER_ID WHERE fu.END_DATE IS NULL

doc_hint: Review active user responsibilities. Check for orphaned responsibilities or excessive privilege grants. Verify no disabled users retain active responsibilities.
analysis_prompt: Summarize user distribution by responsibility. Identify users with excessive or unusual responsibility grants. Flag any high-privilege accounts.
